channel.title: Novice Husband among other things
channel.description: Recent content on Novice Husband among other things

item.title: April Fools Ideas
item.description: April Fools day can be so much fun, but I keep forgetting the actual tricks when it comes to the day. So here are some tricks.

item.title: Gelatin Mix for Beer Clarity
item.description: Description This is to assist with clarification of a 18 to 23 liter batch of beer by adding gelitin to the fermented beer. The beer is not carbonated at this stage.

item.title: Hugo Command Reference
item.description: Instead of constantly googling the same things that I need to do to update my site, I decided that it would be easiest to just create a page with all the commands.

item.title: Kia Ora Aotearoa
item.description: “Kia Ora Aotearoa!” Kia Ora means Hello in Māori, and Aotearoa means Long White Cloud, which is the Māori name for New Zealand. How it all came to pass Tanja got a work offer that allowed us to move to New Zealand.

item.title: Hello Hugo!
item.description: I am using hugo to publish my static site. As simple as expected! I followed these steps, with more information from the starting info page.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: First! I have a new site! Yay! Here is a picture of a dandylion.
